name: Escape Slender Hank
description:
Escape Slender Hank And Destroy The Cristmas Trees.

How it works:

There are 4 christmas trees around the map that you need to destroy and don't get killed by slender hank but be aware you will not be respawned it closes the game even if you get 4 trees burnt AND DONT KILL THE SNOWMAN.

Mechanics:

Press E to burn Christmasstree

Shift to run

Space to jump

CRTL to crouch

WASD movement

Made by:

2 Student devs from The Netherlands that don't know what they're doing.
